Find two words, one from each group, that are most opposite in meaning.
(bright, ancient, soft) (dark, modern, hard)
Options: bright & dark | bright & modern | ancient & dark | ancient & hard | soft & modern
Worked Solution: ‘Bright’ means full of light, while ‘dark’ means lacking light. These two words are direct opposites, making them antonyms.

Subject: verbal_reasoning
Question:
Find two words, one from each group, that are most opposite in meaning.
(top, rich, offer) (rarely, light, receive)
Options: rich & receive | top & light | offer & receive | top & receive | offer & light
Worked Solution: 'offer' and 'receive' are antonyms - they have opposite meanings.
